results.description: Uses multiple datafields? No (single). Applied SUGGESTION1 minimally to keep implementation short. SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector fields). SUGGESTION3 applied because eps coverage=0.5 -> ts_backfill(eps,8). SUGGESTION4: eps has high userCount/alphaCount so preferred. KEPT_IN_MIND: <=2 datafields, <=7 operators. Confidence set to 0.80 because EPS momentum is historically robust.

Used single high-usage field sales (applies SUGGESTION4). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(sales,8) used. SUGGESTION1 partially (1 field). Not vector. Followed KEEP_IN_MIND constraints. Confidence 0.75 — sales growth momentum moderately reliable.

Field cashflow has strong user/alpha counts so applied (SUGGESTION4). ts_backfill applied per SUGGESTION3. Single-field implementation to keep short. Confidence 0.78 — cashflow yield is a quality signal.

Used capex (high userCount) and cash (cash_st) to form ratio (SUGGESTION1+4). ts_backfill applied to both (SUGGESTION3). KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence 0.70 because capex cuts often boost near-term returns.
Used operating_income and sales (SUGGESTION1). Both backfilled (SUGGESTION3). Preference for high userCount fields (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.76 — margin expansion predictive.
Used return_equity (high alphaCount) single-field approach. Backfilled (SUGGESTION3). SUGGESTION1 minimal. Confidence 0.72 — ROE trends useful.
inventory_turnover chosen (high alphaCount). ts_backfill applied. Single-field. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. Confidence 0.68 — inventory efficiency matters cyclical sectors.
Combined working_capital and assets_curr (SUGGESTION1). Both backfilled per SUGGESTION3. Chose these fields due to moderate userCounts (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.69.
Used receivable and sales (SUGGESTION1). Backfilled both (SUGGESTION3). High userCount for receivable supports (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.67.

Used bookvalue_ps and prc (prc not in list so use bookvalue_ps and sales as proxy). Applied bookvalue_ps (high userCount). Backfilled bookvalue_ps. SUGGESTION1 limited. Confidence 0.65 — value signals moderate.
Used cashflow_dividends (high alphaCount) single-field. Backfilled. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.66 — dividends steady signal quality.
Used fnd6_newqv1300_cshopq (total shares repurchased quarter) and ts_backfill both fields. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage low -> backfill. Confidence 0.60 — buybacks helpful but noisy.
Used debt_lt (long-term debt) single-field, backfilled. SUGGESTION4: reasonable userCount. Confidence 0.62 — deleveraging often positive.
Used debt_st single-field. ts_backfill applied (SUGGESTION3). Confidence 0.58 — short-term debt moves can be risky.

results.idea: Capex efficiency: capex to ppent decline
results.description: Combined capex and ppent (SUGGESTION1). Both backfilled per SUGGESTION3. Confidence 0.64 — capital intensity signals medium reliability.

operating_income used with ts_backfill and ts_delta. SUGGESTION4 used. Confidence 0.71.
inventory and sales combined (SUGGESTION1). Backfilled. Rising inventory vs sales is negative. Confidence 0.60.
